thread.title: VR takes dementia patients on a trip down memory lane

title: VR takes dementia patients on a trip down memory lane
text:
VR takes dementia patients on a trip down memory lane   02:17 
An immersive virtual reality experience designed to trigger memories and emotions in people with dementia is helping patients re-engage with relatives and carers. Matthew Stock reports.   
An immersive virtual reality experience designed to trigger memories and emotions in people with dementia is helping patients re-engage with relatives and carers. Matthew Stock reports.  //reut.rs/2ENzY08
